column5: I realize I could search this out.  But OFC is always good a fast replies.  I have my 36 Lb Endura all torn apart right now, because it hasn't been working right for a while.  Drive pin is broken.  Retaining ring pooped off and stuck to one of the magnets in the motor and has worn down to almost nothing.  A seal is shot, so the motor filled up with water.  One brush is worn down to the wire.  Online, I can find all the parts for about $35 US.  But I've never bought parts from them before, and don't know if I should trust them.  Anyone know a shop I can order them from?  I thought there was one in Orillia that I can get Minkota parts..?  Or if anyone knows a good online place that they trust and could recommend?  I want to get it back together soon!  I need my motor for duck hunting and fall fishing/camping.  Any help is greatly appreciated.!  Thanks,  Nick

Minn Kota Dealer - ROCKEY'S TACKLE REPAIR in Orillia, Ontario (Boat Water Sports ) - Location & Hours All Stores »    Minn Kota Motors »    Ontario »    Minn Kota Motors in Orillia Store Details10 Brammer DriveOrillia, Ontario L3V 7T4 Phone: 705-325-3526
Rockys in Orillia, Tyler is running it now the number is 705 325 3526  Lol Terry beat me to it, but he has moved to 3 Royce Ave unit 1 and 2
Nick, just drop it off, let them fix it. That way you will have some warranty as far as work done is. Rockys is well known. DA BEST.
Any idea what they charge an hour?
Any idea what they charge an hour?  Call them bud . LOL
he moved and didnt tell me...damn
Ya Rocky retired. I think Tyler is his grandson not 100%sure, but he is the guy to talk to.
I'll give him a call on Monday.  Hopefully he has the parts I need in stock.  Thanks again guys
I have ordered parts for power drive motor with good luck from both https://northlandmarine.com/ and http://www.mikesreelrepair.com/

Thanks 206!  I also found both those places.  When I looked on the Minkota website, I actually got a quote from the website (USD Before shipping) and for the seals, drive pin, retaining ring and new brushes it only came to $5!  So cheap!  Prices where similar at the two placed you mentioned above.
So Tyler just hooked me up!  All the parts where less than $20 after tax.  And he removed the old seals, and bearing, and pressed knew ones on for me at no charge!!  Great guy, and great service.
Would we stear you wrong dude. Rockys hasnt been around for along time  for nothing.  Good on them , and glad to hear your hooked up again.
